text: A Rage in Harlem is a 1991 movie starring Forest Whitaker, Danny Glover, Robin Givens and Gregory Hines. The movie is set around 1950s New York City. It was given an R rating by the MPAA. The movie was shot in Cincinnati. Category:1991 comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American independent movies
title: A Rage in Harlem
